item.title: Personal Projects
item.description: The Fact-ory> The Fact-ory # HTML, CSS, JavaScript> HTML, CSS, JavaScript # January 2022 - August 2022 Created a web server using Node Express which stores facts based on numerical keys using MongoDB Ran tests on the communication between the front and back end with Jest Maintained using a request/response and server status tracker, as well as a spreadsheet used to track TODO’s and bugs Combatant Creator> Combatant Creator # Java> Java # January 2022 - August 2022

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Geek Squad In-Store Agent - Best Buy Canada Ltd> Geek Squad In-Store Agent - Best Buy Canada Ltd # July 2021 - Present Troubleshoot and fix software issues on computeres for customers Set up newly bought computers to ensure proper functionality Managed internal data system to keep track of checked in computers Game Development Intern - Oooh> Game Development Intern - Oooh # September 2022 - November 2022

item.title: About Me
item.description: Heya! I’m Andy, an undergraduate student at the University of British Columbia. I started playing video games when I was in early elementary school, and I have been playing games ever since.
